cause.description:
Concerts such as LiveAid and LiveEight have helped in the battle against AIDS and HIV in Africa. Music is one of the best way in spreading the messages of the AIDS virus. Whether its rock, rap, hip-hop, country, or even opera music can help. Whether you play music or just love it you can still help.
1. AIDS have killed over 25 million people since first seen on June 5, 1981.
2. AIDS kills 2.4-3.3 million people a year.
3. More than 570,000 of these were children.
4. There is no cure as of right now.
cause.mission: use music in the fight agains AIDS.
cause.name: Music against AIDS/HIV
